8.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: May Allah show mercy to a man who gets up during the night and prays, who wakens his wife and she prays; if she refuses, he sprinkles water on her face. May Allah show mercy to a woman who gets up during the night and prays, who wakens her husband and he prays; if he refuses she sprinkles water on his face

chapter.eng-name: Encouragement To Pray The Night Prayer
